apps.title: AI Chatbot Assistant
apps.description: Intelligent chatbot powered by advanced AI algorithms for customer support and automation.
apps.longDescription: A state-of-the-art conversational AI system that leverages natural language processing to provide intelligent responses. Perfect for automating customer support, answering FAQs, and enhancing user engagement.

apps.title: Task Automation Suite
apps.description: Automate repetitive tasks with powerful automation tools built for productivity.
apps.longDescription: Enterprise-grade automation framework for streamlining workflows, eliminating manual tasks, and increasing operational efficiency. Supports multiple task types and integrations.

apps.title: Data Analytics Dashboard
apps.description: Real-time data visualization and analytics dashboard for business intelligence.
apps.longDescription: Comprehensive analytics platform with interactive visualizations, real-time data processing, and customizable dashboards. Get actionable insights from your data.

apps.title: Machine Learning Model
apps.description: Predictive ML model for pattern recognition and forecasting.
apps.longDescription: Advanced machine learning model trained on large datasets for accurate predictions and pattern recognition. Ideal for forecasting, classification, and anomaly detection.

apps.title: API Gateway
apps.description: Secure and scalable API management system with rate limiting and authentication.
apps.longDescription: Production-grade API gateway for managing multiple endpoints, implementing security protocols, and monitoring API usage. Features include authentication, rate limiting, and logging.

apps.title: Mobile App Builder
apps.longDescription: Create fully functional mobile apps without writing code. Drag-and-drop interface with built-in components, database integration, and cloud deployment.
